info.task: navigate to last option in listbox popup
info.title: Navigate to the last option in a listbox popup

setupScript.name: openListboxToGuava
setupScript.description: sets focus on and expands the Combobox, and sets the focused option to 'Guava'

user: With focus on the listbox popup, navigate to the last option.
instructions.raw: With focus on the listbox popup, navigate to the last option.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Text of the focused option in the popup ('Huckleberry') is conveyed
State of the focused option in the popup (not selected) is conveyed
Position of the focused option in the popup (13) is conveyed
Number of options in the popup (13) is conveyed
